articles.title: Girl group Flo win the BBC Sound Of 2023 - BBC
articles.description: The London trio, whose throwback R&B sound is compared to Destiny's Child, are tipped for the top.
articles.content:
R&B trio Flo have won the BBC's Sound of 2023.
